short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple, privacy-focused, open-source extension that blocks websites based on a your list. Does not track or collect your data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ABOUT
==============================
Simple, privacy-focused, open-source Chrome extension that blocks websites based on your list to help you prevent distract sources.


FEATURES
==============================
☆  Does not track or collect your data.
☆  Supports wildcard domain blocking.
☆  Helps you to keep your focus mode.
☆  With easy switch mode you can instantly block your tabs and easily get them back.
☆  Auto adaptive light / dark mode to keep up with your preferences


NOTE
==============================
Whitelist mode, time-based auto focus mode, customized block page and force-lock mode features will be considered on next versions.
